txt.en: Every day there is something to do in Frostbluff.  Every day there is Yule!  Come and join everyone in Frostbluff and participate in many Yule Festival activities for five more days!
Mara Sandydowns would like to thank you for your continued participation in the Yule Festival.

'Fifteen days?! Yule must be your favourite season - it just must be!

Mara rummages around in a small bag of gifts before handing you a huge one with a colourful bow.

'Have this, my friend and keep on celebrating!'
There are many gifts that await those who participate in the Yule Festival, and for those that celebrate for many days, the gifts are all the grander!
Yule is a season of giving and receiving, and those that give the most often find that they receive the most in return.
Complete 'In the Spirit of Yule' five more times
Every day there is something to do in Frostbluff.  Every day there is Yule!  Come and join everyone in Frostbluff and participate in many Yule Festival activities for five more days!
